name: Who am I? (LKAccidental)
description:
IMPORTANT

THIS IS VERY UNFINISHED

I used this game jam to learn more about unity scriptable objects, coroutines, and other concepts.

Info

A very short story-based mystery game where you talk to different characters to figure out what happened to Niko.

This project was made in 7 days for the Kindred Games Community Jam.

Dev Info

Developed by LKA using the Unity Game Engine

Art assets were made using photoshop.
